name: BookSuggestion
0:
caret
”Alexa open book suggestion”
”Alexa ask book suggestion to find me books of J. K. Rowling”
”Alexa start book suggestion”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: book suggestion
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The book suggestion is the ultimate tool that will help you to decide what to read next whenever you are confused . Thanks to a vast database of 
books with different authors and types , you will get access to a collection of personalized book recommendations provided according to your own preferences.
Whether you are a bookworm or you are just looking for something to read in your free time , Book Suggestion is your virtual library guide.
Dive into a new book adventure with Book Suggestion now ! , all what you need to say is « Alexa open Book Suggestion «.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
